title: Utter annihilation Facebook goes nuclear when deli owner responds to bad review with racist tirade
text:
Utter annihilation: Facebook goes nuclear when deli owner responds to bad review with racist tirade 
Raw Story Friday 23rd October, 2015 
An Idaho deli is receiving a flood of negative reviews and anger after the business owner unleashed a racist tirade on a customer that left a negative review, the...
